languages.text: Примкнув к стае Грозовых укусов, Ульфар Громогласный вскоре стал ее вожаком, сменив с честью павшего Торбальда. Он послал на Фенрис весть, что решил задержаться в Просторе — слишком много врагов еще таилось в этих не тронутых гневом Всеотца угодьях. Легенды золотом вымостили путь грозной стаи. Спустя годы схваток Ульфар наконец отыскал достойную смерть в битве, но тут разверзся варп, и корабли с Фенриса, украшенные волчьей головой, прибыли на помощь. Вынесенный из сечи верным помощником Хальбрандтом, Ульфар принял почести дредноута и был помещен в священную броню. В ходе благословенного ритуала он страшно бранился и требовал, чтобы ему дали умереть, но братья отвечали лишь радостным смехом. Оправившись, Ульфар увел воинство к Звездам Безбожников — в предсмертном видении Всеотец открыл ему новую цель. С тех пор никто в Просторе не слыхал ничего о Космических волках, но многие верят, что однажды они вернутся с победой.

After joining the Stormbiters, Ulfar Thunderlung soon became the pack leader, taking the place of Thorbald, who met an honourable end. The new leader sent a message to Fenris stating his intention to remain in the Expanse — there were too many enemies yet lurking in these hunting grounds that deserved the Allfather's wrath. Legends paved the formidable pack's path in gold. Years later, Ulfar found a battle in which he could meet his honourable death, but the warp was suddenly torn asunder, and ships from Fenris bearing the mark of the wolf head came to his aid. Saved from the battlefield by his loyal companion Halbrandt, Ulfar accepted the honours of the dreadnought and was entombed in sacred armour. During the blessed ritual he cursed and demanded to be left to his death, but his brothers merely answered with mirthful laughter. When he recovered his senses, Ulfar led his forces to the Heathen Stars — the Allfather had given him a new mission in a near-death vision. No one in the Expanse has heard word of the Space Wolves since their departure, yet many believe that one day they will return victorious.
languages.original_text: Примкнув к стае Грозовых укусов, Ульфар Громогласный вскоре стал ее вожаком, сменив с честью павшего Торбальда. traits.locale_text: Joining the pack of the Stormbiters, Ulfar Thunderlung soon became its leader, in place of Thunderlung, who met an honourable death. The new leader sent a message to Fenris, saying that he decided to stay in the Expanse for longer, as there were too many enemies lurking in these hunting grounds, that were yet spared the wrath of Allfather. Legends paved the path of an intimidating pack like gold. Years later Ulfar found a battle in which he could meet his honourable death, yet at that exact moment, warp tore apart, and ships from Fenris with the mark of wolf head came to the rescue. Saved from the battlefield by his loyal assistant Halbrandt, Ulfar accepted the honours of the dreadnought and was put into sacred armour. During the blessed ritual he cursed and demanded he was left to his death, but brothers answered only with joyful laughter. Having come to his senses, Ulfar led the forces to Heathen Stars. In his near-death vision, Allfather opened to him a new goal. Since then, no one in the Expanse has heard anything about Space Wolves, yet many believe that one day they'll return victorious.

Joining the pack of the Stormbiters, Ulfar Thunderlung soon became its leader, in place of Thunderlung, who met an honourable death. The new leader sent a message to Fenris, saying that he decided to stay in the Expanse for longer, as there were too many enemies lurking in these hunting grounds, that were yet spared the wrath of Allfather. Legends paved the path of an intimidating pack like gold. Years later Ulfar found a battle in which he could meet his honourable death, yet at that exact moment, warp tore apart, and ships from Fenris with the mark of wolf head came to the rescue. Saved from the battlefield by his loyal assistant Halbrandt, Ulfar accepted the honours of the dreadnought and was put into sacred armour. During the blessed ritual he cursed and demanded he was left to his death, but brothers answered only with joyful laughter. Having come to his senses, Ulfar led the forces to Heathen Stars. In his near-death vision, Allfather opened to him a new goal. Since then, no one in the Expanse has heard anything about Space Wolves, yet many believe that one day they'll return victorious.

Since they left, no one in the Expanse has heard word of the Space Wolves, yet many believe that one day they will return victorious.

languages.text: 乌尔法·雷狼加入了噬风者狼群，不久之后，他们的领袖索巴德光荣战死，而乌尔法成为了新任首领。他给芬里斯捎了个信，说他打算留在科罗努斯扩区，这片狩猎场里有太多邪恶的敌人，应当受到全父之怒的惩戒。于是，这支强大的狼群踏上了辉煌的传说之路。多年之后，乌尔法找到了可以光荣赴死的战斗，但这个时候，亚空间突然裂开了一道口子，绘有狼首的芬里斯舰船从里面冲了出来，前来支援他。乌尔法被他的忠实伙伴哈尔布兰特从战场上救了回来，并被授予了光荣的无畏仪式，穿上了神圣的盔甲。在受祝仪式上，他一边咒骂着，一边要求让他赴死，而他的兄弟们则报以哈哈大笑。恢复意识之后，乌尔法率领他的狼群前往异端群星，因为他濒死时看到了幻象，而全父在幻象中赋予了他全新的使命。自从太空野狼离开之后，科罗努斯扩区再也没人听说过他们的消息，但许多人坚信，总有一天他们会在胜利中凯旋。
languages.original_text: After joining the Stormbiters, Ulfar Thunderlung soon became the pack leader, taking the place of Thorbald, who met an honourable end. The new leader sent a message to Fenris stating his intention to remain in the Expanse — there were too many enemies yet lurking in these hunting grounds that deserved the Allfather's wrath. Legends paved the formidable pack's path in gold. Years later, Ulfar found a battle in which he could meet his honourable death, but the warp was suddenly torn asunder, and ships from Fenris bearing the mark of the wolf head came to his aid. Saved from the battlefield by his loyal companion Halbrandt, Ulfar accepted the honours of the dreadnought and was entombed in sacred armour. During the blessed ritual he cursed and demanded to be left to his death, but his brothers merely answered with mirthful laughter. When he recovered his senses, Ulfar led his forces to the Heathen Stars — the Allfather had given him a new mission in a near-death vision. No one in the Expanse has heard word of the Space Wolves since their departure, yet many believe that one day they will return victorious.

languages.text: Ulfar Donnerlunge schloss dich dem Rudel Stormbiters an. Bald darauf fand Thorbald ein ehrenhaftes Ende und Ulfar wurde zum Anführer des Rudels. Der neue Leitwolf schickte eine Botschaft nach Fenris, in der er verkündete, in der Ausdehnung bleiben zu wollen. In diesen Jagdgründen lauerten einfach noch zu viele Feinde, die den Zorn des Allvaters verdienten. Legenden pflasterten den Weg des heldenhaften Rudels mit Gold. Jahre später fand Ulfar einen Kampf, in dem er sein ehrenvolles Ende finden konnte. Plötzlich aber tat sich ein Riss im Warp auf und Schiffe aus Fenris kamen ihm zu Hilfe, mit dem Zeichen des Wolfskopfs auf dem Rumpf. Nachdem Ulfar von seinem treuen Gefährten Halbrandt vom Schlachtfeld gerettet worden war, akzeptierte er die Ehre des Dreadnought und wurde in eine heilige Rüstung bettet. Während des gesegneten Rituals fluchte er und verlangte, dem Tod überlassen zu werden, doch seine Brüder lachten nur heiter. Nachdem Ulfar wieder zu Sinnen gekommen war, führte er seine Truppen zu den Sternen der Ungläubigen. Der Allvater hatte ihm in einer Nahtodvision eine neue Mission übertragen. Seit ihrer Abreise hat in der Ausdehnung nie wieder jemand etwas von den Space Wolves gehört. Viele sind aber überzeugt, dass sie eines Tages siegreich zurückkehren werden.
languages.original_text: After joining the Stormbiters, Ulfar Thunderlung soon became the pack leader, taking the place of Thorbald, who met an honourable end. The new leader sent a message to Fenris stating his intention to remain in the Expanse — there were too many enemies yet lurking in these hunting grounds that deserved the Allfather's wrath. Legends paved the formidable pack's path in gold. Years later, Ulfar found a battle in which he could meet his honourable death, but the warp was suddenly torn asunder, and ships from Fenris bearing the mark of the wolf head came to his aid. Saved from the battlefield by his loyal companion Halbrandt, Ulfar accepted the honours of the dreadnought and was entombed in sacred armour. During the blessed ritual he cursed and demanded to be left to his death, but his brothers merely answered with mirthful laughter. When he recovered his senses, Ulfar led his forces to the Heathen Stars — the Allfather had given him a new mission in a near-death vision. No one in the Expanse has heard word of the Space Wolves since their departure, yet many believe that one day they will return victorious.

Der neue Leitwolf schickte eine Botschaft nach Fenris, in der er verkündete, in der Ausdehnung bleiben zu wollen. In diesen Jagdgründen lauerten einfach noch zu viele Feinde, die den Zorn des Allvaters verdienten. Legenden pflasterten den Weg des heldenhaften Rudels mit Gold. Jahre später fand Ulfar einen Kampf, in dem er sein ehrenvolles Ende finden konnte. Plötzlich aber tat sich ein Riss im Warp auf und Schiffe aus Fenris kamen ihm zu Hilfe, mit dem Zeichen des Wolfskopfs auf dem Rumpf. Nachdem Ulfar von seinem treuen Assistenten Halbrandt vom Schlachtfeld gerettet worden war, akzeptierte er die Ehre des Dreadnought und wurde in eine heilige Rüstung bettet. Während des gesegneten Rituals fluchte er und verlangte, dem Tod überlassen zu werden, doch seine Brüder lachten nur heiter. Nachdem Ulfar wieder zu Sinnen gekommen war, führte er seine Truppen zu den Sternen der Ungläubigen. In seiner Nahtodvision hatte der Allvater ihm eine Mission aufgetragen. Seit ihrer Abreise hat in der Ausdehnung nie wieder jemand etwas von den Space Wolves gehört. Viele sind aber überzeugt, dass sie eines Tages siegreich zurückkehren werden.

languages.text: Ulfar Voix-du-Tonnerre rejoignit la meute des Crocs de la tempête et prit rapidement la tête de la meute après la mort de Thorbald, tombé au champ d'honneur. Le nouveau dirigeant adressa un message à Fenris, indiquant son intention de s'attarder quelque temps dans les Étendues : il restait encore de nombreux ennemis qui méritaient de goûter à la fureur du Père de Tous. De nombreuses légendes font aujourd'hui l'éloge des exploits de cette incroyable meute. Des années plus tard, alors qu'Ulfar était sur le point de connaître une mort honorable, le Warp se déchira et des vaisseaux de Fenris, ornés de la marque du loup, vinrent à son secours. Sauvé sur le champ de bataille par Halbrandt, son loyal compagnon, Ulfar accepta les honneurs du Dreadnought et fut enchâssé dans une armure sacrée. Durant le rituel, il lança de nombreuses injures et exigea qu'on le laisse mourir en paix, mais ses frères l'ignorèrent en riant. Revenu à la raison, Ulfar mena ses troupes vers les Étoiles Athées. Le Père de Tous lui avait confié une nouvelle mission dans une vision qu'il avait reçue aux portes de la mort. Depuis leur départ, les Space Wolves n'ont pas refait parler d'eux dans les Étendues, mais beaucoup sont persuadés qu'ils reviendront un jour victorieux.
languages.original_text: After joining the Stormbiters, Ulfar Thunderlung soon became the pack leader, taking the place of Thorbald, who met an honourable end. The new leader sent a message to Fenris stating his intention to remain in the Expanse — there were too many enemies yet lurking in these hunting grounds that deserved the Allfather's wrath. Legends paved the formidable pack's path in gold. Years later, Ulfar found a battle in which he could meet his honourable death, but the warp was suddenly torn asunder, and ships from Fenris bearing the mark of the wolf head came to his aid. Saved from the battlefield by his loyal companion Halbrandt, Ulfar accepted the honours of the dreadnought and was entombed in sacred armour. During the blessed ritual he cursed and demanded to be left to his death, but his brothers merely answered with mirthful laughter. When he recovered his senses, Ulfar led his forces to the Heathen Stars — the Allfather had given him a new mission in a near-death vision. No one in the Expanse has heard word of the Space Wolves since their departure, yet many believe that one day they will return victorious.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar Voix-du-Tonnerre rejoignit la meute des Crocs de la tempête et prit rapidement la tête de la confrérie après la mort de Thorbald, tombé sur le champ d'honneur. Le nouveau dirigeant adressa un message à Fenris, indiquant son intention de s'attarder quelque temps dans les Étendues : il restait encore de nombreux ennemis qui méritaient de goûter à la fureur du Père de Tous. De nombreuses légendes font aujourd'hui l'éloge des exploits de cette incroyable meute. Des années plus tard, alors qu'Ulfar était sur le point de connaître une mort honorable, le Warp se déchira et des vaisseaux de Fenris, ornés de la marque du loup, vinrent à son secours. Sauvé sur le champ de bataille par Halbrandt, son loyal assistant, Ulfar accepta les honneurs du Dreadnought et fut enchâssé dans une armure sacrée. Durant le rituel, il lança de nombreuses injures et exigea qu'on le laisse mourir en paix, mais ses frères l'ignorèrent en riant. Revenu à la raison, Ulfar mena ses troupes vers les Étoiles Athées. Dans la vision qu'il avait reçue aux portes de la mort, le Père de Tous lui avait confié une nouvelle mission. Depuis leur départ, les Space Wolves n’ont pas refait parler d’eux dans les Étendues, mais beaucoup sont persuadés qu'ils reviendront un jour victorieux.

languages.text: Tras unirse a la jauría de los Muerdetormentas, Ulfar Pulmón Atronador no tardó en suceder a Thorbald como líder cuando cayó con honor en combate. El nuevo líder envió un mensaje a Fenris para informar de su intención de permanecer en la Extensión; aún había demasiados enemigos al acecho en ese coto de caza y todos ellos merecían sentir la ira del Padre de todas las cosas. Las leyendas cubrieron de oro el camino de la poderosa jauría. Años más tarde, Ulfar encontró una batalla en la que por fin podía llegar a un final digno, pero la disformidad se desgarró de repente y naves de Fenris con la marca de la cabeza del lobo acudieron en su ayuda. Salvado de la batalla por su fiel compañero Halbrandt, Ulfar aceptó los honores del dreadnought y le enterraron con una armadura sagrada. Durante el sagrado ritual maldijo y exigió que le dejaran morir, pero sus hermanos solo respondieron con una risa alegre. Una vez recuperó el sentido común, Ulfar dirigió a sus fuerzas hacia las Estrellas Paganas: en su visión cercana a la muerte, el Padre de todas las cosas le había dado una nueva misión. Desde que partieron, ningún habitante de la Extensión ha vuelto a oír hablar de los Lobos Espaciales, pero muchos creen que un día volverán triunfantes.
languages.original_text: After joining the Stormbiters, Ulfar Thunderlung soon became the pack leader, taking the place of Thorbald, who met an honourable end. The new leader sent a message to Fenris stating his intention to remain in the Expanse — there were too many enemies yet lurking in these hunting grounds that deserved the Allfather's wrath. Legends paved the formidable pack's path in gold. traits.locale_text: Ulfar se unió a la jauría de los Muerdetormentas y no tardó en suceder a Thorbald como líder tras su honorable caída en combate. El nuevo líder envió un mensaje a Fenris para informar de su intención de permanecer en la Extensión; aún había demasiados enemigos al acecho en ese coto de caza y todos ellos merecían sentir la ira del Padre de todas las cosas. Las leyendas cubrieron de oro el camino de la poderosa jauría. Años más tarde, Ulfar encontró una batalla en la que por fin podía llegar a un final digno, pero la disformidad se desgarró de repente y naves de Fenris con la marca de la cabeza del lobo acudieron en su ayuda. Salvado de la batalla por su fiel asistente Halbrandt, Ulfar aceptó los honores del dreadnought y le enterraron con una armadura sagrada. Durante el sagrado ritual maldijo y exigió que le dejaran morir, pero sus hermanos solo respondieron con una risa alegre. Una vez recuperó el sentido común, Ulfar dirigió a sus fuerzas hacia las Estrellas Paganas: en su visión cercana a la muerte, el Padre de todas las cosas le había dado una nueva misión. Desde que partieron, ningún habitante de la Extensión ha vuelto a oír hablar de los Lobos Espaciales, pero muchos creen que un día volverán triunfantes.

languages.text: 嵐喰いの者の一員に加わったウルファー・サンダーラングは、名誉ある最期を遂げたトールバルドに代わり、すぐにリーダーとなった。新しいリーダーはフェンリスにメッセージを送り、エクスパンスに留まる意思を表明した。この狩場には、全知の父の怒りに値する敵がまだたくさん潜んでいた。この強大な一団が切り開いた道の伝説は、輝かしい黄金の栄光そのものだった。数年後、ウルファーは名誉ある死を迎える戦場を見つけたが、<歪み>が突然引き裂かれ、狼の頭の印をつけたフェンリスからの船が彼を助けに来た。忠実な助手のハルブラントに戦場から救われたウルファーは、ドレッドノートの栄誉を受け入れ、神聖な鎧に包まれ埋葬された。祝福の儀式の間、彼はののしり、勝手に死なせてくれと要求したが、兄弟たちは愉快な笑いで答えただけだった。正気を取り戻したウルファーは、軍を率いて異教に歌われし星々へ向かった。死の間際、全知の父は彼に新たな使命を与えた。彼らが去って以来、エクスパンスでは誰もスペースウルフの消息を聞かなくなったが、いつの日か彼らが勝利して戻ってくると信じる者は多い。
languages.original_text: After joining the Stormbiters, Ulfar Thunderlung soon became the pack leader, taking the place of Thorbald, who met an honourable end. The new leader sent a message to Fenris stating his intention to remain in the Expanse — there were too many enemies yet lurking in these hunting grounds that deserved the Allfather's wrath. Legends paved the formidable pack's path in gold. Years later, Ulfar found a battle in which he could meet his honourable death, but the warp was suddenly torn asunder, and ships from Fenris bearing the mark of the wolf head came to his aid. Saved from the battlefield by his loyal companion Halbrandt, Ulfar accepted the honours of the dreadnought and was entombed in sacred armour. During the blessed ritual he cursed and demanded to be left to his death, but his brothers merely answered with mirthful laughter. When he recovered his senses, Ulfar led his forces to the Heathen Stars — the Allfather had given him a new mission in a near-death vision. No one in the Expanse has heard word of the Space Wolves since their departure, yet many believe that one day they will return victorious.

traits.locale_text: 嵐喰いの者たちの一員に加わったウルファー・サンダーラングは、名誉ある最期を遂げたトールバルドに代わり、すぐにリーダーとなった。新しいリーダーはフェンリスにメッセージを送り、エクスパンスに留まる意思を表明した。この狩場には、全知の父の怒りに値する敵がまだたくさん潜んでいた。この強大な一団が切り開いた道の伝説は、輝かしい黄金の栄光そのものだった。数年後、ウルファーは名誉ある死を迎える戦場を見つけたが、<歪み>が突然引き裂かれ、狼の頭の印をつけたフェンリスからの船が彼を助けに来た。忠実な助手のハルブラントに戦場から救われたウルファーは、ドレッドノートの栄誉を受け入れ、神聖な鎧に包まれ埋葬された。祝福の儀式の間、彼はののしり、勝手に死なせてくれと要求したが、兄弟たちは愉快な笑いで答えただけだった。正気を取り戻したウルファーは、軍を率いて異教に歌われし星々へ向かった。死の間際、全知の父は彼に新たな使命を与えた。彼らが去って以来、エクスパンスでは誰もスペースウルフの消息を聞かなくなったが、いつの日か彼らが勝利して戻ってくると信じる者は多い。

languages.text: Ulfar Tufanciğer, Borayutanlara katıldıktan kısa bir süre sonra, onurlu bir ölüme kavuşan Thorbald'ın yerini alarak sürü lideri oldu. Yeni lider, Fenris'e, bu av sahasında Yücebaba'nın öfkesini hak eden daha çok sayıda düşman bulunduğunu ve Enginlik'te kalma niyetinde olduğunu söyleyen bir mesaj gönderdi. Burada kudretli sürüyü, onu efsanelere konu edecek, altından bir yol bekliyordu. Ulfar yıllar sonra onurlu bir ölüme kavuşabileceği bir muharebe buldu ancak öteboyut aniden paramparça oldu ve kurt başı işaretini taşıyan Fenris gemileri yardımına geldi. Sadık yoldaşı Halbrandt tarafından savaş alanından kurtarılan Ulfar, dretnot bahşedilme onurunu kabul etti ve bir daha çıkmamak üzere kutsal zırha girdi. Kutsal ayin sırasında lanetler yağdırdı ve ölüme terk edilmeyi talep etti ancak kardeşleri bunu yalnızca neşeli kahkahalarla karşıladı. Ulfar kendine geldiğinde kuvvetlerini Küffar Yıldızlara götürdü. Yücebaba, yaşadığı ölüme yakın deneyimde ona bir görü bahşetmiş ve yeni bir görev vermişti. Yola çıkmalarının ardından Enginlik'te kimse bir daha Uzay Kurtları'na dair bir şey duymadı. Birçokları bir gün muzafferane bir şekilde geri döneceklerine inanıyor.
languages.original_text: After joining the Stormbiters, Ulfar Thunderlung soon became the pack leader, taking the place of Thorbald, who met an honourable end. The new leader sent a message to Fenris stating his intention to remain in the Expanse — there were too many enemies yet lurking in these hunting grounds that deserved the Allfather's wrath. Legends paved the formidable pack's path in gold. Years later, Ulfar found a battle in which he could meet his honourable death, but the warp was suddenly torn asunder, and ships from Fenris bearing the mark of the wolf head came to his aid. Saved from the battlefield by his loyal companion Halbrandt, Ulfar accepted the honours of the dreadnought and was entombed in sacred armour. During the blessed ritual he cursed and demanded to be left to his death, but his brothers merely answered with mirthful laughter. When he recovered his senses, Ulfar led his forces to the Heathen Stars — the Allfather had given him a new mission in a near-death vision. No one in the Expanse has heard word of the Space Wolves since their departure, yet many believe that one day they will return victorious.
